subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Omar Gonzalez replaced Geoff Cameron in the heart of the United States defense and had a strong game in a 1-0 loss to Germany.
snippet: Omar Gonzalez replaced Geoff Cameron in the heart of the United States defense and had a strong game in a 1-0 loss to Germany.
